title: Contact us- Phone, Email, Mail
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Verify- Contact us- Phone, Email, Mail
custom_steps:
WHEN

Verify these links:

- By Phone
- By Email
- By Mail
custom_expected:
THEN

- 'By Phone' should bring up native phone app (e.g Facetime, Zoom etc)
- 'By Email' should bring up native mail client
- 'By Mail' shouldn't do anything

title: Contact us- Verify these Customer Support links:
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Verify these Customer Support links:
custom_steps:
WHEN

- Online sponsorship
- Ticketing
- General Site Enquiries
custom_expected:
THEN

Upon clicking/tapping on these links the email client should open up with the appropriate email address pre-filled

title: Contact us- Verify these General information links:
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Verify these General information links:
custom_steps:
WHEN

- Milb.TV
- Tickets
- Mobile Apps
- Fans
- Shop
- Auctions
custom_expected:
THEN

Upon clicking/ tapping user should be navigated to the appropriate pages

WHEN

custom_expected:
THEN

1. User is brought back to the home page

title: Ellipsis dropdown menu (Dynamic based on screen size)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Ellipsis dropdown menu
custom_steps:
WHEN

- Hover over the three dot ellipsis bar to see the dropdown menu
- Make sure all these links are visible and clickable:

Tickets
Shop
About
Events
Fans
First Pitch app
Gameday Audio
Podcast
Teams
custom_expected:
THEN

- Hovering over the tab should show the dropdown menu

title: Teams (Top Nav)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on milb homepage and

User wants to go to the Teams page
custom_steps: WHEN the user Clicks tap on 'Teams' link
custom_expected: THEN the User should be navigated to https://www.milb.com/about/teams

title: MILB.TV (Top Nav)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on Milb HomePage
custom_steps: WHEN the user Clicks on MLB.TV link from header
custom_expected: THEN the User should be navigated to https://www.milb.com/live-stream-games/subscribe

title: Search (Top nav)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User wants to Search a word/topic within MILB.COM
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Tap/click on Search icon
2. Tap/click on the X button
3. Type in Search box
4. Select any of the matches
custom_expected:
THEN

1. Search box appears with X button
2. Search box closes
3. - If no matches are there then nothing is showing or suggesting
   - If there is a match, results show in a drop down list
4. User is navigated to the appropriate page

title: Shop
custom_preconds: Given when the user is on MILB Homepage
custom_steps: When the User clicks on "SHOP"
custom_expected: Then the user is navigated to "milbstore.com"

title: Home Page Hero Article
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Home page hero image/article
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Verify there is a home page hero image with a title and a subtitle
2. Click/ tap on the home page  hero image
custom_expected:
THEN

1. Home page hero image is visible with a title and a subtitle
2. User is navigated to the News page with the article on it within the same browser tab

title: Top Headlines
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

Top Headlines
custom_steps:
WHEN

Locate the 'Top headlines' and tap/click on the links under that heading
custom_expected:
THEN

All the links are navigating user to the appropriate pages

title: Follow MILB
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

'Follow MILB' Social media links
custom_steps:
WHEN

Locate the 'Follow MILB' and tap/click on the social media links (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Youtube, Email)
custom_expected:
THEN

All the links are navigating user to the appropriate pages

title: Top Prospects
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User wants to see what is under Top Prospects section
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Verify there is a 'Top Prospects' tile with players information and profile pictures
2. Verify players' profile pictures clickable
custom_expected:
THEN

1. User is navigated to the appropriate palyers' pages on the same browser tab

title: Ben's Biz
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User wants to navigate to Ben's Biz section
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Verify there is a 'Ben's Biz' tile with image links and CTAs 
2. Verify the images and articles are clickable
3. Verify there is 'More on Ben's Biz link at the bottom of the tile
3. Verify 'More on 'More on Ben's Biz' is clickable
custom_expected:
THEN

1. User is navigated to the appropriate  pages within the same browser tab

title: Leaders
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User wants to explore Leaders section
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Verify there is a 'Leaders' tile at the lower right rail of the page
2. Verify the tile has a drop down for different divisions and they are selectable
3. Verify there are separate column for 'Batting' and 'Pitching'
4. Verify selecting difference divisions from the drop down dynamically changes the information under the two separate columns
5. Verify players' names are clickable
custom_expected:
THEN

1. User can dynamically see different players as they choose a different divisions from the drop down
2. User can click/tap on the players and navigated to detail pages

title: Trending on MILB.com
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

User wants to see what is under Trending on MILB.com section
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. Verify there is a 'Trending on Milb.com' tile with images, CTAs and links
2. Verify user can click/tap on these images, CTAs and links
custom_expected:
THEN

1. User is navigated to the appropriate pages within the same tab
2. Twitter links should open up new tabs

title: Diversity and inclusion
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

'Diversity and Inclusion' tile
custom_steps:
WHEN

- Verify there is a 'Diversity and inclusion' tile at the on page with various images and links 
- Verify clicking/tapping on the images and articles navigate user to the appropriate pages within the same tab
custom_expected:
THEN

User is navigated to the appropriate pages

title: MILB on Twitter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

''MiLB on Twitter' tile (bottom of the page)
custom_steps:
WHEN

- Verify there is a 'MiLB on Twitter' tile at the bottom of the page with various images link from Twitter
- Verify clicking/tapping on the Twitter image links expnads and overlays the Twitter feeds on the same page
custom_expected:
THEN

The Twitter feeds are showing and upon clicking/tapping they are expanding witha 'X' button to exit out

title: MILB on Instagram
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

''MiLB on Instagram' tile
custom_steps:
WHEN

- Verify there is a 'MiLB on Instagram' tile with images link from Instagram
- Verify clicking/tapping on the Instagram image links expands and overlays the Instagram feeds on the same page
custom_expected:
THEN

The Instagram feeds are showing and upon clicking/tapping they are expanding with a 'X' button to exit out

title: More from MiLB.com
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

''More from Milb.com' tile (bottom right rail)
custom_steps:
WHEN

- Verify there is a 'More from Milb.com' tile at the bottom right rail with several CTA links
- Verify clicking/tapping on the CTAs navigates user to the appropriate links
custom_expected:
THEN

User is navigated to the appropriate links
